title: Altrincham
name: The Railway
content: A traditional pub with excellent real ales and a great atmosphere. Unchanged from the 1930's. Serves lunch M-F 12:00-14:00. This pub still has individual rooms, so you can escape into your own corner if required. Sky Sports. Watch out for the Coronation Street star! This is the venue for the Altrincham Festival pub quiz, usually in the second week of July
